speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Tom calling from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm doing alright, thanks. What is this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm calling regarding the outstanding balance on your account. Can I have your address to access your details?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you! You have a balance of $250 that is past due. When can we expect payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I wasn't aware of that amount. Can you give me more details?

speaker: Agent
text: The balance is from your last credit card payment. Would you like to settle this today?

speaker: Customer
text: I need to think about it. Can I call you back?

speaker: Agent
text: Of course, but just to remind you, this is subject to additional fees if not resolved soon.

speaker: Customer
text: Thank you for letting me know. I'll reach out soon.

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for your time. We look forward to hearing from you.
